title: my shop wont open plz help
body: I have 10.000 ip and cant do anything with it I wont to buy {{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the fixes outlined on the P[VP.net Store issues Knowledgebase](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-) article and let me know if anything helps.

did all still wont open

could it be patch 6.3 could open in 6.2
Could you try [switching to a Public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me and let me know if that helps.
did that did not work my wifi is fine I'm on 25 ping
You can try purchasing champions through your profile for now, past that I cant help you but I'm sure if anyone knows they'll jump in soon.
